long_description: at neev, we believe that the way to success passes through building sound concepts and developing a genuine love for the field. at neev, we model our interactive classroom into small batches of focused students engaged with an insightful mentor. through our holistic approach, we infuse deep knowledge of the subjects into our students. cracking the jee or neet is about the approach, and about determination. at neev, this art is taught by a close-knit group of skilled individuals. it will not only help students do well at boards but also in various talent search exams like ntse, nlstse and science olympiad.
